attributes.action: Stop the needless construction of Hooton Crematorium on precious green belt land
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We wish to ask the Prime Minister to intervene and stop the construction of a new crematorium on green belt land at Hooton Cheshire.  Local planning officers and local residents agree that there is no need for a new crematorium in the area. Residents are opposed to the needless destruction of green belt land and the added pollution and environmental damage.  Local councillors have ignored the views of local people and the recommendation of their own planning officers by voting in favour of the application.  We wish the government to call the application in and overturn the local councillors.
